results.title: Becoming me
results.creator_credit: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Tyson Cunningham can’t express himself, music does it for him. Although he has long given up dreams of fronting a band like his brother, music is still everything to him, and expresses his emotional life like nothing else.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: On a Sunday he went fishing
results.creator_credit: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

video_links.name: On a Sunday he went fishing

results.brief_description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.

results.title: Ride
results.creator_credit: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: BMX is life
results.creator_credit: Harley Van Belkolm, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Riding and doing tricks on his BMX is when Harley Van Belkolm feels free. He provides some insight into this passion of his, the culture that surrounds it and why he wouldn’t be doing anything else.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Harley Van Belkolm, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Street kids
results.creator_credit: Dmitry Schukin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: From Russia to Werribee, via the gangs of Los Angeles and Las Vegas, Dmitry Schukin’s story is one of redemption through art. He talks openly about the crimes of his past and the pursuits that have helped him channel all the negative into something positive and given Schukin something to fight for.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dmitry Schukin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Just say no
results.creator_credit: Christiana Dumitru, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Christiana Dumitru’s father died and her family had to move, she turned to a partying lifestyle. Hooked on drugs at an alarmingly young age, Dumitru reflects on the strength of will she had to summon to get back on track and the friends and family she has learnt to value.

results.title: Western stories : expressions for the future
results.brief_description: Eight young people from Melbourne’s west share their stories of family, identity and the incidents that have changed their lives. Created as part of the Digital Storytelling program ‘Western stories: expressions for the future’ at ACMI.

group_works.title: Life will never be the same
group_works.creator_credit: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Life will never be the same
results.creator_credit: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘You don’t need to jump on a plane, or go to a theme park or stay at a five star hotel to experience the beautiful things in life.’ Amanda Jurisic remembers her father’s legacy : a sense of adventure and a love of travel. The values he taught her have stayed with her, and inspired her to travel the world.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: ‘You don’t need to jump on a plane, or go to a theme park or stay at a five star hotel to experience the beautiful things in life.’ Amanda Jurisic remembers her father’s legacy : a sense of adventure and a love of travel. results.title: Ready and able
results.brief_description: Members of the CFA provide practical advice on how to prepare for and survive a major catastrophe like a bushfire or a flood. These interviews were conducted in light of the tragic Black Saturday bushfires in February 2009.
results.description: Members of the CFA provide practical advice on how to prepare for and survive a major catastrophe like a bushfire or a flood. These interviews were conducted in light of the tragic Black Saturday bushfires in February 2009.

results.title: When a fire comes to you
results.brief_description: When the threat of fire hit Lydia Romari’s family, they adopted their fire plan and stayed safe. Unfortunately, it doesn’t erase the frustration, anxiety and horror of the Black Saturday bushfires that devestated much of the Yarra Ranges region in Victoria in 2009.
results.description: When the threat of fire hit Lydia Romari’s family, they adopted their fire plan and stayed safe. Unfortunately, it doesn’t erase the frustration, anxiety and horror of the Black Saturday bushfires that devestated much of the Yarra Ranges region in Victoria in 2009.
